intro_story: It's the year 2070. Recent breakthroughs in space technology have made it more common to use robots for space missions. Robots can be exposed to hazardous environment, and their batteries can be recharged via solar panels, meaning that more, potentially dangerous planets can be explored at a lower cost.
Mark, an astronaut robot, is travelling through space in search for life outside planet Earth. Things have been quite good so far, ...
...when suddenly, an asteroid flies past, colliding with his spaceship. The collision destroyed the rear compartment of the ship, forcing him to perform a crash landing.
Fortunately, Mark managed to land on a nearby planet. Now, he's seeking for help to repair his severely damaged spacecraft.
After a while, Mark found a vehicle rescuer named Roger.

dialogues.speaker: Roger
dialogues.line: Welcome to Roger's Vehicle Rescue Service. We repair any vehicle ever existed. How can I help you?

dialogues.speaker: Mark
dialogues.line: Oh... A large meteorite hit my spacecraft and left a big hole on it.

dialogues.speaker: Roger
dialogues.line: What a serious accident! Could you guide me to the spaceship's location?

dialogues.speaker: Roger
dialogues.line: Well...After quick inspection, I could see that the collision has destroyed the ship's thrusters, communication device and energy core. Repairing these will be very expensive.

dialogues.speaker: Mark
dialogues.line: I know... But I have almost no cash or anything like that.

dialogues.speaker: Roger
dialogues.line: No problem. There's a cave not far away. You can go down there and mine some ores for me.

dialogues.speaker: Roger
dialogues.line: Just one thing, it's very dangerous down there, be careful or you might end up like your spacecraft.

dialogues.speaker: Mark
dialogues.line: Wow! Thank you so much for your help!

dialogues.speaker: Floating Beast
dialogues.line: How dare you killed my people! I won't let you get away with that!

intro: With Roger's help, Mark is confident that he can contiue his journey.
But he's seriously wrong! An angry giant is blocking his way, ready to smash him into pieces.

outro: Having beaten the Floating Beast, Mark flew away from the planet, continuing his journey to explore more about life outside Earth.
